text: Judgment Day (2004) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their SmackDown! brand. It took place on May 16, 2004 at the Staples Center in Los Angeles, California. It was the sixth Judgment Day event held by WWE. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Mark Jindrak (with Theodore Long) defeated Funaki) Singles match 3:44 2 Rob Van Dam and Rey Mysterio defeated The Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von Dudley) Tag team match 15:17 3 Torrie Wilson defeated Dawn Marie Singles match 6:15 4 Mordecai defeated Scotty 2 Hotty Singles match 3:02 5 Charlie Haas and Rico (c) (with Miss Jackie) defeated Hardcore Holly and Billy Gunn Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 10:26 6 Chavo Guerrero (with Chavo Classic) defeated Jacqueline (c) Singles match for the WWE Cruiserweight Championship 4:49 7 John Cena (c) defeated René Duprée Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 9:54 8 The Undertaker (with Paul Bearer) defeated Booker T Singles match 11:28 9 John "Bradshaw" Layfield defeated Eddie Guerrero (c) by disqualification Singles match for the WWE Championship 23:16 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Judgment Day 2004 website Category:2004 in American television Category:2004 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Los Angeles Category:WWE Judgment Day Category:2000s in Los Angeles, California Category:2004 in California
title: Judgment Day (2004)
